overview:
XMission is one of the oldest and most experienced Internet service companies in the United States, and Utahâ€™s leading independent Internet service provider (ISP). Headquartered in Salt Lake City, XMission provides broadband Internet connectivity, digital phone service, web and email hosting, advanced networking, and colocation services to residents and businesses.

In 2007, XMission became the first Internet service provider in Utah to upgrade to 100% renewable energy through Rocky Mountain Powerâ€™s Blue Sky program.

XMission also proudly supports hundreds of Utahâ€™s nonprofit organizations by providing free web hosting services, in-kind donations, and sponsoring community-based events and facilities.

Detailed descriptions of XMissionâ€™s services are available online at www.xmission.com. XMission can be reached by email at sales@xmission.com or by phone at 877.964.7746.
